bibl.title: The Golden Bowl: Thoughts on the New Sappho and its Asianic Background. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: 1. Summary introduction. - 2. Dawn and the Sun, in East and West. - 3. The goddess goes up to bed: Greek εἰσαναβαίνειν. - 4. Greek dawn and the New Sappho [P. Colon. Inv. 21351 + 21376 (= M.-P.3 1449.01; LDAB 10253)]. - 5. Conclusion: the Anatolian context of early Greek poetry.
bibl.seg: WATKINS Calvert, The Golden Bowl: Thoughts on the New Sappho and its Asianic Background. Avec résumé en anglais.

1. Summary introduction. - 2. Dawn and the Sun, in East and West. - 3. The goddess goes up to bed: Greek εἰσαναβαίνειν. - 4. Greek dawn and the New Sappho [P. Colon. Inv. 21351 + 21376 (= M.-P.3 1449.01; LDAB 10253)]. - 5. Conclusion: the Anatolian context of early Greek poetry.
